entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
